name: Within the Vault
description:
The Fixer's job is supposed to be simple. When a job needs a weapon, he goes into the Vault and gets one out. Simple. That was until the Vault started growing. Now the Boss has tasked the Fixer with figuring out why and how to stop it for good.

Development team

Writer: Shashank Bhat
Art: Ronan Sandoval, Victoria Lee
Sound Design: Evan Higgs
Music: Victoria Lee
Programming: Yalmaz Abdullah, Marcus Der
Executive Producer: Zach Selk

Made for the INTD 450 capstone course at the University of Alberta in the 2023 winter term.
